title: Google Maps Advanced Scraper Input
description: Input schema for the advanced Google Maps scraper actor.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Optional list of Google Maps URLs (search results or place details) to start scraping from.

search.title: Search Query
search.description: Keywords to search for on Google Maps (e.g., 'restaurants', 'plumbers'). Used if startUrls is empty.

searchLocation.title: Search Location
searchLocation.description: The location (city, area) to perform the search in. Used if startUrls is empty.

language.title: Language
language.description: Language code for Google Maps interface (e.g., 'en', 'ro', 'es'). Affects some extracted data.

maxItems.title: Max Places
maxItems.description: Maximum number of places to extract. 0 means unlimited.

includeReviews.title: Include Reviews
includeReviews.description: Extract detailed reviews for each place.

maxReviews.title: Max Reviews per Place
maxReviews.description: Maximum number of reviews to extract per place (if includeReviews is true). 0 means all.

includeReviewerInfo.title: Include Reviewer Info
includeReviewerInfo.description: Extract details about reviewers (name, profile link). Use with caution regarding privacy/GDPR.

maxCostPerRun.title: Max Cost Per Run (USD)
maxCostPerRun.description: Estimated maximum cost for this run on the Apify platform. 0 means no specific cost limit.
